blocks.content:
## **My Availability**

Right now, I'm contracting at The Co-op, working on their [Insurance](https://www.coop.co.uk/insurance/) website. They've extended my contract until **May 2021** so I won't be looking for a new role until April at the earliest.

### Podcast

In January 2021, I launched a podcast to speak to some of the interesting people I've worked with and highlight some of the interesting stuff going on in the Manchester tech scene. You can find out more, subscribe to it and see a list of published episodes by following [this link](https://podcast.tweakdigital.co.uk).

hero.headline: Hi, my name is John Peden
hero.textline: I'm a senior JavaScript developer based in Manchester.
